nt_bdr wrote:
>
> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com 
> <mailto:archive-crawler%40yahoogroups.com>, Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...> 
> wrote:
> >
> > nt_bdr wrote:
> > > Can Heretrix be configured to write out the referring url for each
> > > page it writes out to the arc file?
> >
> > That's already in the crawl.log (6th column).
> >
> > There's not a convenient place for such info in the ARC file.
> >
> > - Gordon @ IA
> >
>
> Thanks for the response. The crawl.log that I have in my Heretrix set up
> is a file that is continually being written to. Is there way to
> control the size of this log, may be by causing it to rollover on a
> daily or a weekly basis?
>
>
